author: Jorge Martinez
comment: I dont even know how to open it, if any of you know how to open it, tell me

reply.author: Irony Software
reply.content: After installing, watchface should be visible in list of watchfaces on your smart watch and in Android Wear app.

title: How do you even use it

author: jean rivera
comment: I love it but it needs the Google between am/pm and 24h I would rate 5 star if it is available for free that option

reply.author: Irony Software
reply.content: Hi! I just published an update, you can install it and use 12-hour time format.

title: It needs am pm

author: Dan R
comment: Great watch face.  I forgot you had to open the companion app in the Android wear app.

reply.author: Irony Software
reply.content: Dear user, this feature is already present. You just need go to Android Wear companion app, select Illusion WatchFace from list of watchfaces and open it's settings. After this you'll be able to buy full version and unlock all settings.

comment: Much more customizability and looks better.
